kannada_original: ಯಾರ ಹೇಳಲಿ ನೂರು, ಬದುಕು ನಿನ್ನದೂ ಗೆಳೆಯ !
english_transliteration: Yāra hēḷali nūru, baduku ninnadū geḷeya!
english_translation: Let anyone say a hundred things, life is yours too, friend!
According to your experience, you are Siddha (realized), Buddha (enlightened)!
Will you become the Buddha just by sitting under the Bodhi tree?
You are an ascetic (Yati) according to your mind (intellect)! – Muddu Rama.
